channel.title: 317 staff zone help

item.title: 317 staff zone help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”) && playerRights >= 1) {
triggerTele(Xcoord, Ycoord, 0);
}

the words in bold, I will explain

bold 1) staffzone = this is the command name, so the command is ::staffzone
bold 2) PlayerRights = player rank, to see if they player is a normal player, a mod, an admin, or an owner.
bold 3) >= simple, bigger or equal to
bold 4) 1 = the one is equaled to “mod” heres a list: normal = 0, mod = 1, admin = 2, owner = 3, hidden = 4.
bold 5) xcoord = the x position you wanna take to the person when they do the staffzone command
bold 6) ycoord = the y position you wanna take to the person when they do the staffzone command
bold 7) 0 = the height level, I recommend 0 because its touching the ground

Read full topic
